Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object
Represents a Reservation object that customers can make. Contains the essential details of a reservation.
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
10
Author:
Beh Ming Jun

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Reservation​(int contact, String dateAndArrivalTime, int numPax, String name)
    Creates a new Reservation with the given contact date and arrival time, number of pax and name of person who made the reservation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Reservation

      public Reservation​(int contact, String dateAndArrivalTime, int numPax, String name)
      Creates a new Reservation with the given contact date and arrival time, number of pax and name of person who made the reservation.
      Parameters:
      contact - This Reservation's contact number (person who booked the Reservation).
      dateAndArrivalTime - This Reservation's date and booking time.
      numPax - This Reservation's number of pax.
      name - This Reservation's name (person who booked the Reservation).

  • Method Details

    • getIsExpired

      public boolean getIsExpired()
      Get the current date and time and check if the Reservation has expired. Reservation is considered expired if it has been more than 15 minutes past the Reservation date and time.
      Returns:
      true if Reservation has expired.

    • getTimeDiff

      public long getTimeDiff​(Date date1, Date date2, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Get the time difference between 2 Date objects in minutes.
      Parameters:
      date1 - First date to be compared.
      date2 - Second date to be compared.
      timeUnit - The timeunit that will be returned Eg. MINUTES.
      Returns:
      The time difference in minutes.

    • convertToDate

      public Date convertToDate​(String dateTime)
      Converts a String in the format "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm" into a Date object.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - String to be converted into Date object.
      Returns:
      The date object after conversion.

    • convertExpiryDateTime

      public Date convertExpiryDateTime​(Date dateTime)
      Adds 15minutes to a Date object to get the expiry date and time of a Reservation.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The date and time of the Reservation.
      Returns:
      The expiry date and time.

    • checkContact

      public boolean checkContact​(int contactNumber)
      Given an contactNumber input, check if this Reservation's contact matches the input.
      Parameters:
      contactNumber - The contact number to check with Reservation's contact.
      Returns:
      true if the contact number matches.

    • printReservation

      public void printReservation()
      Prints the Reservation details (name, contact number, date and arrival time, number of pax).

    • getExpiryDateTime

      public Date getExpiryDateTime()
      Get the expiry date and time of Reservation.
      Returns:
      The expiry date and time.

    • getContact

      public int getContact()
      Get the contact number of the person who made the Reservation.
      Returns:
      Contact number of person.

    • getNumPax

      public int getNumPax()
      Get the number of pax of the Reservation.
      Returns:
      The number of pax.
